definition: the whole amount, determine the sum of
details:
noun
- the whole amount
= synonyms: aggregate
- a quantity obtained by the addition of a group of numbers
= synonyms: amount
- the choicest or most essential or most vital part of some idea or experience
= synonyms: substance
- the final aggregate
= example: the final aggregate
= synonyms: summation
- a set containing all and only the members of two or more given sets
= synonyms: union
- a quantity of money
= example: a quantity of money
= synonyms: amount
verb
- determine the sum of
= synonyms: tally
- be a summary of
= example: be a summary of
= synonyms: summarize, summarise, sum up
